welcome.TITLE:
Full Stack

Web Developer
welcome.PARAGRAPH_1: Daniel has a solid background and advanced knowledge in web development. For over 17 years, he has been designing, developing and managing IT projects for companies such as: Dell, Intel, Manpower Inc, Huawei, World Trade Center, Exxon Mobil, Blackberry, among others.

about_me.TITLE: About me
about_me.PARAGRAPH_1: Daniel has been coding since age 11 and pursued his interest in technology by earning a degree in telecommunications.
about_me.PARAGRAPH_2: He is passionate about creating value for people using his skills in software development, helping them solve their needs more efficiently and faster.
about_me.PARAGRAPH_3: Expert in JavaScript and contributor in the open source community, he manages technologies such as:

open_source.TITLE: Open Source
open_source.PARAGRAPH_1: Daniel is an open source enthusiast and devotes his free time to building projects in this field.
open_source.PARAGRAPH_2: He is the creator and maintainer of "node-express-mongodb-jwt-rest-api-skeleton" and "vue-skeleton-mvp".
open_source.PARAGRAPH_3: These projects are a "starter web app kit" for any developer who wants to build their own app without starting from scratch: API + Frontend
open_source.PARAGRAPH_4: Both projects have been downloaded thousands of times by web developers around the world.
open_source.PARAGRAPH_5:
API (NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB)
